taskDescription:
Your Intermediate-level learners are learning communicative skills which they would need when booking travel in another country. You have given them a group oral task of making decisions about what sort of lodging they want to book for an upcoming 5-day trip. They must agree upon lodging amenities for their stay (e.g. wifi, beds per room, pool, parking, air conditioning, meals included, etc). You are sharing the task objectives with them to clarify the communicative goals of the task.

 

Create one specific and measurable Can-Do Statement which would be appropriate for this group oral task. Discuss your answer with others and check the sample answer below to see if you’re on the right track! There is more than one appropriate objective, so the provided answer is just one example.
solutionText: I can explain my lodging preferences to my travel companions using original, connected sentences
